summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image depicts a snowy landscape with two characters interacting. One character is standing and appears to be dressed in elaborate clothing, holding a staff. The other character is sitting on the ground, wearing a fur-lined coat. The environment includes snow-covered trees and a wooden structure with a lit torch. There is a circular tray with items on the ground near the seated character. The text on the screen reads, "I was a fox guai who practiced to become one of the humans." Various icons are displayed on the screen, indicating game elements such as health, inventory, and controls.
